<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_apptmnt_booking.AppointmentBookingConstants</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Constants File for appointment booking</description>
        <name>AppointmentBookingConstants</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AppointmentBookingConstants = Class.create();
AppointmentBookingConstants.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'AppointmentBookingConstants'
};

//Appointment Booking Constants 
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT = "appointment";
AppointmentBookingConstants.CONFIGURATION = "configuration";
AppointmentBookingConstants.CALENDAR = "calendar";
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_BOOKING_DAO = "appointment_booking_dao";
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_BOOKING_IMPL = "appointment_booking_impl";
AppointmentBookingConstants.LOGGING_VERBOSITY = "sn_apptmnt_booking.logging.verbosity";

//properties
AppointmentBookingConstants.DATE_PICKER_FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK = "glide.ui.date_picker.first_day_of_week";

//operation constants
AppointmentBookingConstants.CREATE = "create";
AppointmentBookingConstants.UPDATE = "update";

//source constants
AppointmentBookingConstants.PLATFORM = "platform";
AppointmentBookingConstants.PORTAL = "portal";

//Table Names
AppointmentBookingConstants.SERVICE_CONFIG_TABLE = "sn_apptmnt_booking_service_config";
AppointmentBookingConstants.CONFIG_TABLE = "sn_apptmnt_booking_config";
AppointmentBookingConstants.CATALOG_ITEM_PRODUCER = "sc_cat_item_producer";
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_TABLE = "sn_apptmnt_booking_appointment_booking";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_TABLE = "sm_order";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_TASK_TABLE = "sm_task";
AppointmentBookingConstants.LOCK_TABLE = "sn_apptmnt_booking_lock";
AppointmentBookingConstants.ADVANCED_CONFIGURATION_TABLE = "sn_apptmnt_booking_day_configuration";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SERVICE_CONFIGURATION_RULE_TABLE = "sn_apptmnt_booking_config_rule";

//States
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_STATES = {};
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_STATES.NEW = "new";
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_STATES.PENDING = "pending";
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_STATES.CONFIRMED = "confirmed";
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_STATES.CANCELLED = "cancelled";
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_STATES.COMPLETED = "completed";

AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_TASK_STATES = {};
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_TASK_STATES.DRAFT = "1";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_TASK_STATES.PENDING = "10";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_TASK_STATES.ASSIGNED = "16";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_TASK_STATES.ACCEPTED = "17";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_TASK_STATES.WIP = "18";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_TASK_STATES.CLOSED_COMPLETE = "3";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_TASK_STATES.CLOSED_INCOMPLETE = "4";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_TASK_STATES.CANCELLED = "7";

AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES = {};
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES.DRAFT = "1";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES.READY = "10";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES.AWAITING_APPROVAL = "11";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES.APPROVED = "13";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES.AWAITING_QUALIFICATION = "15";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES.ASSIGNED = "16";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES.WIP = "18";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES.CLOSED_COMPLETE = "3";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES.CLOSED_INCOMPLETE = "4";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SM_ORDER_STATES.CANCELLED = "7";

//Logger
AppointmentBookingConstants.DEFAULT_LOGGER_SOURCE = "AppointmentBookingLogger";
AppointmentBookingConstants.DEFAULT_LOG_LEVEL = 3;

//Field Name
AppointmentBookingConstants.TASK_TABLE = "task_table";

AppointmentBookingConstants.DYNAMIC = 'dynamic';
AppointmentBookingConstants.AUTO_ASSIGN = 'auto';
AppointmentBookingConstants.WORK_DURATION = "work_duration";
AppointmentBookingConstants.AVERAGE_TRAVEL_DURATION = "average_travel_duration";
AppointmentBookingConstants.LEAD_TIME = "lead_time";
AppointmentBookingConstants.CANCEL_BY_TIME = "cancel_by_time";
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_DURATION = "appointment_duration";
AppointmentBookingConstants.BOOKABLE_TIME = "bookable_time";
AppointmentBookingConstants.CATALOG_ITEM = "catalog_item";
AppointmentBookingConstants.AVAILABILITY_TABLE = "availability_table";
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_BOOKING_CONFIG = "appointment_booking_config";
AppointmentBookingConstants.FUTURE_BOOKABLE_MAX_DAYS = "future_bookable_max_days";
AppointmentBookingConstants.BOOKABLE_DAYS = "bookable_days";
AppointmentBookingConstants.HOLIDAY_SCHEDULE = "holiday_schedule";
AppointmentBookingConstants.ACTIVE = "active";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SCRIPT = "script";
AppointmentBookingConstants.SCRIPTED = "scripted";
AppointmentBookingConstants.START = "start";
AppointmentBookingConstants.END = "end";
AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENTS_PER_BOOKABLE_SLOT = "appointments_per_bookable_slot";
AppointmentBookingConstants.AVAILABILITY_METHOD = "availability_method";
AppointmentBookingConstants.AUTO_ACCEPTANCE = "auto_acceptance";
AppointmentBookingConstants.PORTAL_VIEW = "portal_view";
AppointmentBookingConstants.NUMBER = "number";
AppointmentBookingConstants.LOCATION = "location";
AppointmentBookingConstants.USER_CONTACT = "user_contact";
AppointmentBookingConstants.STATE = "state";
AppointmentBookingConstants.DEFAULT_TIMEZONE = "default_timezone";
AppointmentBookingConstants.ENABLE_ADVACED_CONFIG="enable_day_level_config";
AppointmentBookingConstants.RULE="service_configuration_rule";
AppointmentBookingConstants.CAPACITY = "capacity_based";
AppointmentBookingConstants.ACTIVITY_CATALOG = "activity_catalog";

// Date and Time format settings
AppointmentBookingConstants.USER_TIME_FORMAT_12_HOUR = "12hr";
AppointmentBookingConstants.USER_TIME_FORMAT_24_HOUR = "24hr";
AppointmentBookingConstants.USER_DATE_FORMAT_OPTIONS = { weekday: 'short', year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric' };
AppointmentBookingConstants.USER_TIME_FORMAT_OPTIONS = { hour: 'numeric', minute: 'numeric',hourCycle : 'h23' };

//Messages
AppointmentBookingConstants.NO_APP_CONFIG = gs.getMessage("No valid application configuration found");
AppointmentBookingConstants.NO_AGENTS_FOUND = gs.getMessage("No agents found");
AppointmentBookingConstants.UPDATE_FAILED = gs.getMessage("Update failed");
AppointmentBookingConstants.UPDATE_PASSED = gs.getMessage("Update passed");
AppointmentBookingConstants.INVALID_CONFIG = gs.getMessage("Invalid Configuration");
AppointmentBookingConstants.NO_RANGES_PROVIDED = gs.getMessage("No ranges provided");
AppointmentBookingConstants.INVALID_BOOKABLE_WINDOWS_CONFIGURED = gs.getMessage("Invalid Bookable Windows Configured");

AppointmentBookingConstants.SCHEDULED_SUCCESS = gs.getMessage("Your appointment has been scheduled successfully.");
AppointmentBookingConstants.RESCHEDULED_SUCCESS = gs.getMessage("Your appointment has been rescheduled successfully.");
AppointmentBookingConstants.CANCEL_SUCCESS = gs.getMessage("Your scheduled appointment has been canceled.");
AppointmentBookingConstants.SCHEDULED_ERROR = gs.getMessage("Your appointment cannot be scheduled.");
AppointmentBookingConstants.RESCHEDULED_ERROR = gs.getMessage("Your appointment cannot be rescheduled.");
AppointmentBookingConstants.CANCEL_ERROR = gs.getMessage("Your appointment cannot be canceled.");

sn_apptmnt_booking.AppointmentBookingConstants.SCHEDULED_ERROR_CONTACT_EMPTY = gs.getMessage("Contact information is empty.");

AppointmentBookingConstants.START_DATE = "1970-01-01";
AppointmentBookingConstants.DEFAULT_LEAD_TIME = 14400; //4 hours
AppointmentBookingConstants.DEFAULT_FUTURE_BOOKABLE_MAX_DAYS = 14;
AppointmentBookingConstants.DEFAULT_LIMIT = 1000;
AppointmentBookingConstants.DEFAULT_APPOINTMENT_PER_SLOT_LIMIT = 1000;

AppointmentBookingConstants.WM_DISPATCH = "59e22fb137032000158bbfc8bcbe5d52";

// UI Translations
AppointmentBookingConstants.TRANSLATIONS = {};
AppointmentBookingConstants.TRANSLATIONS.SELECT_APPOINTMENT = gs.getMessage("Select an appointment");
AppointmentBookingConstants.TRANSLATIONS.LABEL_APPOINTMENT = gs.getMessage("Appointment");
AppointmentBookingConstants.TRANSLATIONS.UI_UNKNOWN_ERROR_MESSAGE = gs.getMessage("Oops! Something went wrong while determining availability.");
AppointmentBookingConstants.TRANSLATIONS.DASH = "-";

// Error Codes
AppointmentBookingConstants.ERROR_CODES = {};
AppointmentBookingConstants.ERROR_CODES.UNKNOWN_ERROR = {"message":gs.getMessage("An unknown error occurred"),"code":1};
AppointmentBookingConstants.ERROR_CODES.CONFIG_NOT_FOUND = {"message":gs.getMessage("Appointment booking configuration not found"),"code":10};
AppointmentBookingConstants.ERROR_CODES.USER_PERMISSION = {"message":gs.getMessage("User do not have permission to access this page"),"code":100};
AppointmentBookingConstants.ERROR_CODES.UNKNOWN_ERROR_CODE = {"message":gs.getMessage("Unknown Error Code"),"code":5000};
AppointmentBookingConstants.ERROR_CODES.APPOINTMENT = {"LIMIT_REACHED":gs.getMessage("You have reached the maximum number of appointments that can be created in a 24-hour period."),
													  "CREATION_FAILED":gs.getMessage("Appointment window is no longer available. Please select another appointment.")};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-05-19 23:16:37</sys_created_on>

        <sys_scope display_value="Appointment Booking">d0f0c1303ba23200ce8a4d72f3efc4ac</sys_scope>

</record_update>
